MHEB Eservices Offpeak Alliance begins Cc Hey Tonight will mark the first night of the MHEB Eservices Offpeak Alliance The Eservices group just signed a contract a copy of which will be provided to you effectuating an commercial agreement where Enron will attempt to market a mutually agreed upon quantity of offpeak power outside of MAPP including KCPL MPS above a MHEB determined reference price In addition if you see a bid in MAPP that is greater than the reference price let MHEB know about it MHEB and Eservices will share the profit from trades done Also if there is a TLR LLR curtailment MHEB will share half the cost of the transmission loss Nature of deal This is to be a friendly leadin deal hopefully to be cultivated into longer term deal that will allow us access to some more lucrative products Transacting Call MHEB during the night shift and their realtime desk will tell you how many MW are available and what the reference price will be If you can sell the power for more that the reference price transmission inform the MHEB desk and get it done Be careful of TLRs and ATC restrictions MAPPF ATC Flowgate website on MAPP Oasis Under the heading Flowgate ATC select NonFirm ATC to check the atc for flowgates COOPERS FTCALS and PRIBYN These are the flowgates that usually cause our MAPPF requests to be declined You can also check the specific path POR to POD under the heading Contract Path ATC oacoacscriptatcshtml Booking Deal should be entered in the Eservices PL just like the MDEA deal and in enpower Do not Enpower any deals until the Book is created Pricing Formula Energy Price paid to MHEB SP Cost RP RP SP Sales Price RP Reference Price MAPP Price to beat Cost All cost incurred BuyResale transmission etc Eservices Staff Kayne Coulter and JD Kinser will be the lead contacts for questions regarding this deal JD will be the lead in charge of MHEB during the day and will work with MHEB You can call either of these guys with questions as well me at any time with questions Kayne I spoke with Glen Matthews today and he said that he thought that they would have some power available beginning HE Keep in contact with them through the early evening and durin the night We believe that this deal in the future will be very lucrative for Enron and MHEB Therefore please use all diligence to make sure the deals are done correctly and maximize value for us both If there are any questions tonight please callpage Kayne Coulter or me Thanks Don
